Terra.tabs.hint.tabMenu: {hiddenTabs} items are hidden. Select to display {hiddenTabs} hidden items
Terra.tabs.hint.removable: . item is removable via Delete or Back Space key
Terra.tabs.lift: You have lifted a tab in position {startPosition}. Use the arrow keys to drag the tab to a new position. You cannot move it past the first or last position. Press SPACE to place the tab or ESCAPE to cancel.
Terra.tabs.drag: You have moved the tab from position {startPosition} to position {endPosition}
Terra.tabs.cancelDrag: Movement cancelled. The tab has returned to its starting position of {startPosition}
Terra.tabs.drop: You have dropped the tab. It has moved from position {startPosition} to {endPosition}
Terra.tabs.focus: Press ENTER to activate a tab, or Press SPACE to start a drag. Ensure your screen reader is in focus mode or forms mode
